name: A Christmas Tale
description:
A Christmas Tale

Game made by LTP for the Gamedev.tv GameJam 2022 themed "Death is only the beginning"! 

════════════════∘◦❁◦∘════════════════

When waiting for Santa to come down the chimney, loud stomps can be heard on the ceiling, is Santa here?

Walk and explore around the living room to find the most memorable objects for whoever might be in the chimney, but be careful, your decision might make him mad.

This game has multiple endings (5). Death is only the beginning!

════════════════∘◦❁◦∘════════════════

Controls:

- WASD for movement

-ESC or TAB to open the settings menu

- CTRL to crouch

-E or Left Click for interactions

-G or Right Click for dropping items

-F or Click for skipping cinematics
